sentence.Network_en: Malthus was hotched at the news of his first plan's failure.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到其第一方案失败的消息,马尔萨斯坐立不安起来了.

sentence.Network_en: The Year of Six Million: Math of Population — was Malthus Right?

sentence.Network_en: In this particular instance, Malthus was eventually proven wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 就这一特别人口学观点, 人们最终证明马尔萨斯并不正确.

means.word_mean: 1. an English economist who argued that increases in population would outgrow increases in the means of subsistence (1766-1834)
